verbose_text: To assess whether MMP2 was a downstream mediator of circ-TIMP2 in IC treated NP cells, NP cells were co-transfected with circ-TIMP2 and MMP2 siRNA; the results demonstrated that MMP2 silencing significantly attenuated the effects of circ-TIMP2 on inhibiting collagen-II and aggrecan expression in NP cells treated with TNF-alpha and IL-1beta (XREF_FIG).
